ai-patthana16.36:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.36:1.1_0: for the sake of fewness of wishes, not for the sake of a limited Teaching.
ai-patthana16.36:2.1_1: The fourteen grounds, fourteen objects, sixteen objects,
ai-patthana16.36:2.1_2: all the more than fourteen bases.
